extension.summary: "A Confluence ZEITGEIST" is a clean and modern rework of the Confluence skin.
extension.description:
"A Confluence ZEITGEIST" is a clean and modern rework of the Confluence skin. It mainly features an icon-based main menu without the need for scrolling and two all new wall views, which replace the old thumbnail view. Many other small graphics updates and optimizations are included.
Reworked Genre Icons are based on the great work by the following authors: limav > most genre icons http://limav.deviantart.com/art/Movie-Genres-Folders-432790953/ sonerbyzt > comedy/war genre icons http://sonerbyzt.deviantart.com/art/Movie-Genres-Folders-593250046/ xzener > sci-fi genre icon http://addons.kodi.tv/show/resource.images.moviegenreicons.xzener-flat/ (Disclaimer: The images used to create the folders are not mine, all image rights are reserved to their owners, firms and creators.)
